title: Sourdough cod cheeks with spicy pea salsa
description: This sophisticated dish takes a lesser known part of the fish and jazzes it up as a sensational starter.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a food processor.
ingredients: 1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only, plus extra lemon wedges to serve
20 cod cheeks, cleaned, membranes removed (available from fishmongers or online specialists)
vegetable oil (or vegetable oil mixed with beef dripping), for deep-frying
3 tbsp roughly chopped fresh mint leaves
2 green chillies, de-seeded and roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
